title: Bouquet of sunflower with eucalyptus
description: Brighten any occasion with our stunning sunflower bouquet, featuring vibrant yellow sunflowers, lush eucalyptus, and delicate fillers, all wrapped in rustic kraft paper. Perfect as a thoughtful gift or centerpiece, this cheerful arrangement brings warmth and joy to any setting.
perfectFor: Summer Parties, Get-well Wishes, Housewarming gift

title: Bouquet of red roses with plaster of paris
description: Express your deepest emotions with our passionate red rose bouquet, adorned with delicate baby’s breath and lush green leaves, elegantly wrapped in red and gold paper with a matching ribbon. Ideal for romantic gestures or heartfelt celebrations.

title: Pure White Rose Elegance Bouquet
description: Embrace timeless beauty with our pure white rose bouquet, featuring an abundance of pristine blooms and vibrant green foliage, simply tied with a natural twine. Perfect for weddings, sympathy, or any occasion calling for refined elegance.

title: Roses in a box
description: Delight someone special with our charming pink rose hatbox, filled with soft pink roses and delicate baby’s breath, presented in a stylish white hatbox with a drawstring. A unique and thoughtful gift for birthdays or surprises.

title: Bouquet with 1 Rose
description: Sometimes, one rose says more than a dozen. This elegantly wrapped single rose bouquet speaks of pure love, admiration, and sincerity — a timeless gesture that’s perfect for making a quiet yet unforgettable impression.

title: Bouquet with 7 Rose
description: Delicate yet impactful, this bouquet of 7 premium roses, wrapped in a sleek white cover, strikes the perfect balance between simplicity and significance. Each rose represents a reason to love, cherish, or admire — coming together to form a bouquet that's full of meaning.
perfectFor: Romantic gestures, Anniversaries, Milestones, or when 1 rose just isn’t enough.

title: Bouquet with 9 Rose
description: Delicate yet impactful, this bouquet of 9 premium roses, wrapped in a sleek white cover, strikes the perfect balance between simplicity and significance. Each rose represents a reason to love, cherish, or admire — coming together to form a bouquet that's full of meaning.
perfectFor: Romantic gestures, Anniversaries, Milestones, or when 7 roses just isn’t enough.

title: Bouquet with 10 Rose and Gypsophila
description: This enchanting bouquet features 10 elegant roses paired with delicate gypsophila, also known as baby's breath. The soft, airy gypsophila enhances the classic beauty of the roses, creating a bouquet that’s both timeless and romantic. Wrapped with care and crafted to impress, it’s a stunning blend of sophistication and charm.

title: Bouquet with 12 Rose and Gypsophila
description: This enchanting bouquet features 12 elegant roses paired with delicate gypsophila, also known as baby's breath. The soft, airy gypsophila enhances the classic beauty of the roses, creating a bouquet that’s both timeless and romantic. Wrapped with care and crafted to impress, it’s a stunning blend of sophistication and charm.
perfectFor: Anniversaries, Proposals, Romantic surprises, or 10 roses are not enough

title: Bouquet of roses and chrysanthemums
description: A  beautiful harmony of roses and chrysanthemums, this bouquet brings together elegance and cheerfulness in one graceful arrangement. The soft petals of the roses blend seamlessly with the vibrant textures of the chrysanthemums, making it a unique and heartfelt gift for any occasion. Freshly arranged and thoughtfully wrapped, it’s a bouquet full of warmth and expression.
perfectFor: Birthdays, Thank-you Gestures, Celebrations of Friendship

title: Bouquet with 7 roses and gypsophila and teddy bear
description: This charming bouquet features 7 elegant roses delicately paired with soft, cloud-like gypsophila, all accompanied by an adorable plush teddy bear. It’s a perfect blend of romance and comfort—expressing love, warmth, and affection in the most heartfelt way. Beautifully arranged and ready to melt hearts, this gift is as thoughtful as it is delightful.

title: Oriental Lilly Bouquet
description: Elegant and captivating, this Oriental Lily bouquet radiates sophistication with its large, fragrant blooms and graceful petals. Known for their sweet scent and striking appearance, these lilies bring a sense of serenity and beauty to any space. Wrapped with care and styled for impact, it's a timeless gift that speaks volumes.

title: Cypriot Lilly Bouquet
description: Bursting with the vibrant warmth of the Mediterranean, this Cypriot Lily Bouquet blends radiant yellow, fiery red, and sunset-orange lilies into a stunning expression of joy and energy. Symbolizing passion, positivity, and celebration, each bloom adds bold color and exotic charm to any moment worth remembering.
perfectFor: Name days, Housewarmings, Summer Celebrations, Bold Romantic Gestures

title: Seasonal flowers in a box
description: Celebrate the beauty of the season with this delicate box arrangement featuring soft aspers, fragrant lilacs, and charming mini carnations. Thoughtfully curated to evoke freshness and natural elegance, this floral ensemble brings a calming, garden-inspired touch to any space.
perfectFor: Springtime gestures, Birthdays, new beginnings, thank-you gifts

title: Lilies, roses and stargazers
description: A dramatic fusion of elegance and fragrance, this stunning bouquet features radiant roses, graceful lilies, and captivating stargazers, all wrapped in a sleek black cover for a bold, modern finish. The vivid blooms contrast beautifully with the dark wrap, creating a powerful statement of love, strength, and sophistication.

title: Teddy Bear Box
description: A sweet surprise that says it all — this charming gift set features a plush teddy bear nestled beside fresh, premium roses, beautifully arranged in a keepsake box. Whether you're celebrating a birthday, anniversary, or just sending love, this thoughtful pairing of soft cuddles and elegant blooms delivers warmth and affection in every petal.
perfectFor: Romantic Gestures, Baby Welcomes, get-well-soon gifts

title: Basket with Roses
description: Overflowing with grace and beauty, this handcrafted rose basket is the perfect expression of love, admiration, or celebration. Featuring a lush selection of fresh, premium roses arranged in a rustic woven basket, this design brings timeless elegance to any moment.
perfectFor: Anniversaries, Birthdays, Corporate Gestures, Housewarmings Gifts

title: Basket with 22 Roses and Gypsophila
description: A graceful blend of rustic charm and floral elegance, this wooden basket features fresh-cut roses paired with delicate Gypsophila, also known as baby’s breath. The soft, cloud-like texture of the Gypsophila beautifully complements the bold romance of the roses, creating a design that feels both whimsical and timeless.
perfectFor: Weddings, Anniversaries, Home Decor, Sympathy Gifts
